entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Rankin Inlet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:25 AM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -43.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rankin Inlet Airport 07:25 AM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -43.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -63
Dewpoint: -47.3°C
Wind: N 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 39.
entry.summary: Sunny. Ice fog at times this morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 39. Wind chill minus 64 this morning and minus 57 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 44.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 44. Wind chill minus 57 this evening and minus 64 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023
